entities.name: crowd
entities.description: The crowd is described as being made up mostly of witches around Mrs Weasley’s age. This suggests that the crowd is a diverse group of people, but with a majority of witches.

entities.name: witches
entities.description: Witches are mentioned as making up most of the crowd. They are described in relation to Mrs Weasley’s age, implying that they are likely middle-aged women.

entities.name: Mrs Weasley
entities.description: Mrs Weasley is mentioned as being around the same age as the majority of witches in the crowd. This suggests that she is a respected and possibly older member of the community.

entities.name: wizard
entities.description: A wizard is described as looking harassed and standing at the door. He is trying to maintain order in the crowd.

relationships.description: The crowd contains a majority of witches, as described in the text.
The crowd includes people around Mrs Weasley’s age, implying that she is part of the crowd.
The wizard is trying to regulate and maintain order in the crowd.
